attributes.action: include 'none of the above' as an option on ballot papers, and for that number to potentially cause an election to be 'null and void'.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many members of society, including the electorate and politicians, are increasingly worried about increasingly low turnout in elections. We petition the government to enact legislation to include an option declaring 'none of the above' or 'abstain' on every ballot paper in local and national elections. Should, upon completing a vote count, this option be in the majority, the election will be declared 'null and void' and another vote be called. In this way the electorate will have a way to show if they are truly discontented with contemporary politics by registering a vote of no-confidence in the electoral process.

rejection.details: Too similar to an existing petition: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/noneoftheabove/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
